Address.Address1: Via Anello Del Pino, 8 - 48015 Milano Marittima

Description.Text:
On the beach you will find free sun beds and umbrellas and, in addition, you can take advantage of room service.





It is a family-run establishment offering a greek restaurant serving fresh seafood.
Centrally located, right on the beach of Olympiada, Chalkidiki, just 500 meters from Stagira, the birthplace of Aristotle and less than 40 kilometers away from Mount Athos.
Rooms at Olympic Hotel include a minibar, TV and private bathroom with shower and complimentary toiletries.
